transcript: No, I'm just like you. I thought I was gonna be all Roses and peaches and the bills would just pay themselves and we'll have three fat rosy cheek children and Huh, baby the jokes on us. Could you know what you get?

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: No I'm just like you.  I thought it was going to be all roses and peaches and the bills would just pay themselves.  And we'll have three, fat rosy cheeked children.  Huh, baby, the joke's on us.  Because you know what you get?
